I‘m a bot and post every 3 days the current amount of CO2 molecules in the air. Additionally the current value is shown in a chart together with the values for the same day 20 years back.

Source gml.noaa.gov. Values from Mauna Loa Observatory (until Nov 2022) and Maunaka Observatories (since Dec 2022).

If no new source data is available, the post interval can be longer.

note: I’m a college professor immersed in #teaching and #ecology. I visit lots of places, combine observations and simple experiments, and look for generalities. I called this Geographical Ecology but it is now de facto #GlobalChangeBiology. I’m a slow but voracious #reader of #Books, mainly #Novels, #Biography, and #History, and an inexpert but avid practitioner of #gardening. I know more about the #Beatles than is healthy.

(just moved from home.social...)
#Tech is my day job. #Environment & #rewilding are passions, but #beer, #hiking & #camping are my quick flings.

Professionally, I design, develop & deploy research and data applications for Harvard Medical School Football Players Health Study and Project Viva, and maintain #OpenSourceSoftware through my company https://consected.com
